Shariah listGuidelineDev

Tradingview Shariah Indicator

What it does#

Add a small green indicator() intradingview.com. At the moment, only cover Malaysian, NYSE, Nasdaq, Shenzhen, Shanghai at the moment.

Inspired from:https://github.com/amree/tradingview-shariah-indicators

Download#

Also available in:

Installation guide:

  1. Install with:

    • Chrome
    • Firefox
    • EdgeandBrave: Please follow this steps and then install this extension via chrome store.
  2. Click button "Add to Chrome" / "Add to Firefox"
  3. Open https://tradingview.com
  4. Goto any of this pageChart/Screener/Symbols
  5. You can also you this page for more easy navigationlist
